tsp

Class VertexSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • tsp.VertexSet

  • public class VertexSet
extends java.lang.Object
    A VertexSet is used to store multiple vertices in form of an ArrayList. Additionally the VertexSet provides a map reference helping to draw all vertices properly onto the GUI.
    Author:
    Roman Boegli

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      MapReference mp

      constructor I, used to initiate a new empty VertexSet

      constructor III, used to initiate a new VertexSet with the vertices provided
      VertexSet(Vertex... vertices)
      constructor II, used to initiate a new VertexSet with the vertices provided

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addVertex(Vertex v)
      Appends the provided Vertex to the end of the VertexSet.
      void defineMapReference()
      Locates the corner points in order to draw all vertices properly

      Method used to get detailed information about a VertexSet in form of a multiline string.

      Returns the number of vertices stored in the VertexSet.

      • VertexSet

        public VertexSet(Vertex... vertices)
        constructor II, used to initiate a new VertexSet with the vertices provided
        Parameters:
        vertices - multiple Vertex object which should be stored in the VertexSet

      • VertexSet

        public VertexSet(java.util.ArrayList<Vertex> aList)
        constructor III, used to initiate a new VertexSet with the vertices provided
        Parameters:
        aList - an ArrayList holding multiple Vertex objects which should be stored in the VertexSet

    • Method Detail

      • addVertex

        public void addVertex(Vertex v)
        Appends the provided Vertex to the end of the VertexSet.
        Parameters:
        v - Vertex being appended.

      • getVertex

        public Vertex getVertex(int index)
        Returns the vertex at the specified position in this VertexSet.
        Parameters:
        index - Index of the element to return.
        Returns:
        Vertex stored at indicated index.

      • getNumberOfVertices

        public int getNumberOfVertices()
        Returns the number of vertices stored in the VertexSet.
        Returns:
        Number of vertices stored in in the VertexSet.

      • getInfo

        public java.lang.String getInfo()
        Method used to get detailed information about a VertexSet in form of a multiline string.
        Returns:
        Accumulates the info string of each Vertex stored in this VertexSet retrieved by the Vertex-method .getInfo().

      • getTotalDistanceWGS

        public double getTotalDistanceWGS(Path p)
        Returns the total distances generated when traveling trough all the vertices stored in this VertexSet according to the provided Path. Calculated the distances based on the WGS coordinate system (World Grid).
        Parameters:
        p - Path object indicating in what order the vertices are being perambulated
        Returns:
        the total distance as a double value

      • defineMapReference

        public void defineMapReference()
        Locates the corner points in order to draw all vertices properly
